title: Can GCash QR Payments be used in other countries?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How do I use Scan to Order on GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/36066111052441-How-do-I-use-Scan-to-Order-on-GCash)
- [How can I use Scan to Pay via QR Code?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017563034-How-can-I-use-Scan-to-Pay-via-QR-Code)
- [Can GCash QR Payments be used in other countries?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/7540023800601-Can-GCash-QR-Payments-be-used-in-other-countries)
- [I can’t scan the QR code. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31315639906073-I-can-t-scan-the-QR-code-What-do-I-do)
- [I was charged multiple times after using Scan to Pay QR. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31315974255129-I-was-charged-multiple-times-after-using-Scan-to-Pay-QR-What-do-I-do)
- [Merchant didn't receive the payment and/or SMS when I used Scan to Pay. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31316001083289-Merchant-didn-t-receive-the-payment-and-or-SMS-when-I-used-Scan-to-Pay-What-do-I-do)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

YES, [Fully Verified](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account#h_01FPYEDSZ597DXA7JF5NWD6PBC) GCash users can use GCash QR for payments in select countries outside the Philippines if the merchant is a partner of Alipay+.

Here’s an example of a QR code where you can pay with your GCash outside of the Philippines.

![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/41041383522969)

Tap here to see the full list of countries that accept GCash QR payments

**Note:** Before paying, please make sure that the merchant is a partner of Alipay+

01. Australia
02. Austria
03. Belgium
04. Bulgaria
05. Cambodia
06. China
07. Croatia
08. Cyprus (Republic of Cyprus)
09. Czech Republic
10. Denmark
11. Estonia
12. Finland
13. France
14. Germany
15. Greece
16. Hong Kong
17. Hungary
18. Iceland
19. Ireland
20. Italy
21. Japan
22. Laos
23. Latvia
24. Liechtenstein
25. Lithuania
26. Luxembourg
27. Macao
28. Malaysia
29. Malta
30. Mongolia
31. Nepal
32. Netherlands
33. New Zealand
34. Norway
35. Poland
36. Portugal
37. Qatar
38. Romania
39. San Marino
40. Singapore (Must be a Filipino GCash user)
41. Slovakia
42. Slovenia
43. South Korea
44. Spain
45. Sweden
46. Switzerland
47. Thailand
48. Turkey
49. United Arab Emirates
50. United Kingdom
51. United States of America
